question: 記念碑
sourceMnemonic: Some <kanji>tombstone</kanji>s are used to <kanji>write down</kanji> the <kanji>thought</kanji>s of dead people. They're <vocabulary>monument</vocabulary>s. They can be really big or really small, but they have to be dedicated to somebody (usually a dead somebody).
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
